comments.author: Hodoor
comments.body: I think you need to explain a bit more about the payment aspect of this campaign. You said you have allocated 1000$, and since this campaign will take 50 participants, does that mean one will get paid 20$ for a full month of work ?One more thing, do you have to use the examples given above as you just copy and paste them ? You don't need to create original questions or responses in the relevant channels?

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: OP is this a BTC paid campaign or not  as I see Payment will be paid in IBCO token from the raised funds of the ICO??

comments.author: Hodoor
comments.body: Quote from: Woodie on August 28, 2022, 09:16:34 PMOP is this a BTC paid campaign or not  as I see Payment will be paid in IBCO token from the raised funds of the ICO?? There is not IBCO token, IBCO stands for intial bitcoin coin offering.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Woodie on August 28, 2022, 09:16:34 PMOP is this a BTC paid campaign or not  as I see Payment will be paid in IBCO token from the raised funds of the ICO?? They probably meant to say that the payment will be made in BTC after IBCO (Initial Bitcoin Chip Offering) Phase 1, i.e. after they raise the money in the crowdfunding.
